title: Why is Warring Kingdoms Nidalee unavailable?
body: I read on surrender at 20 that this skin would NOT be legacy but in my store it doesn't come up unless i click on Nidalee where it says unavailable. I'm pretty sure I still have the option to buy the bundle with the skin for a few more days but why cant I still buy the skin individually?

replies.body: This may be a stupid question, But do you have Nidalee unlocked?

Warring Kingdoms Nidalee is not a legacy skin, and shouldn't leave the store.  We're working to get this issue resolved ASAP.

EDIT: Lunar Revel skins should once again be in the store!
Same issue here. Not wanting to spend 30 bucks for the Nidalee and Kat skins with them being champs i don't play often. Wonder what is up. I just want to buy jinx!! D:

I'm hoping its a bug since they just released the 4 new skins. I don't understand why they would keep the bundles available after the skins were put in the vault (even though none of this years lunar skins were reported to be legacy.)

I believe I read they won't be going in the vault, so I would assume it is just a bug. hopefully it is fixed in the morning! I've been through hoops and chutes and all sorts of things to get this RP in my hand. Was going to grab it last night on sale but had issues with my Paycheck. =/

Yea, good luck to ya! On the news page it said all the old legacy skins should be available until 2/23 and I heard people are having trouble buying those too so I'm pretty sure this is a bug, but hopefully it gets fixed tomorrow or something.
There's even a banner for this years lunar revel skins still in my client stores featured section but when I click on it the regular skin tab opens.
